mapper.select:
select * from spider_log where 1=1
and spider_head like CONCAT('%',#{spider_head},'%')
and request_url like CONCAT('%',#{request_url},'%')
and request_ip like CONCAT('%',#{request_ip},'%')
and str_to_date(time,'${dateFormat}') BETWEEN str_to_date('${starttime}','${dateFormat}') and str_to_date('${endtime}','${dateFormat}')
limit #{start},#{pageCount}

select count(*) from spider_log where 1=1
and spider_head like CONCAT('%',#{spider_head},'%')
and request_url like CONCAT('%',#{request_url},'%')
and request_ip like CONCAT('%',#{request_ip},'%')
and str_to_date(time,'${dateFormat}') BETWEEN str_to_date('${starttime}','${dateFormat}') and str_to_date('${endtime}','${dateFormat}')
